taxon.author: (Walckenaer, 1841)
taxon.distribution: Cyprus, Israel, Caucasus (Georgia, Russia), Iran, Pakistan, India, Philippines, China to Indonesia, Japan, Australia. Introduced to Seychelles, Pacific Is.

referenceObject.reference: Walckenaer, C. A. (1841). Histoire naturelle des Insects. Aptères. Tome deuxième. Roret, Paris, 549 pp., pl. 16-22.
